page.title: 03A Day on a Farm-Stamford Br.
page.content:
I get up just after 7.30 in the morning and have breakfast.My first job of the day is getting the tractors ready for the days work. Every day there are different jobs depending on what time of year it is.Today I am going to start cutting the grass,to make hay.I go into the field and cut all the grass down.Then I use the fork lift truck to unload some fertilizer which has just arrived.At 12.00 I have my lunch.After lunch I start to get the combine harvester ready for harvest time.This takes all afternoon.As this is not a very busy time of the year I finish work at 4.45.After tea I cut the garden hedge and do other small jobs round the garden and farm yard.
Mr. Smith:Townend Farm:June 1985.
